comment._content: Church was at northeast corner (I believe) of East 60th and Madison Avenue, New York. This should be the same view today. Here's the history of the building and congregation.

comment._content:
The location, on November 2, 1913, of the funeral of multimillionaire Charles Gilbert Gates.
